content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Using body is blank criteria Cloud Email Gateway Protection can scan messages for blank bodies. Note Cloud Email Gateway Protection detects any of the following cases as blank bodies: Bodies with no text nor HTML tags Bodies with only white space characters No body entity Procedure On the Scanning Criteria tab, click Advanced. Select Body is "blank". Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
